name: Angel Town-no IAP(In App Purchase),play the game without spending money
name_original: Angel Town-no IAP(In App Purchase),play the game without spending money
description:
【$2.99 ---> $0.99】
◆Anniversary ceremony(○^～^○),original price:$2.99,now the price is $0.99!

【No IAP】
◆No IAP(In App Purchase)! If you download the game, you don't need to spend money in the game any more!

---------------Features---------------
【The most popular RTS】
Without a doubt,angel town is the most popular RTS(Real-Time Strategy Game) in this year.It's the game the toucharcade said "subversion of the traditional strategy game" !

【Simple Controls】
The game is very simple.Smooth, polished touch interaction.

【Summon the Angels】
The player summon a variety of angels.

【Player VS Player】
Fighting with other players!

【Challenge】
Game Center support.The top 10 of the player's name will be displayed real time in the game.Who is the most powerful player?

【More】
And..... more to come!

---------------Feedback---------------
We'd love to get your feedback.
E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
Twitter:@Crabsoft

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
